    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BudgetManegement
    Manages the budget system, including transactions, income sources, categories, and notifications.
    Category
    Represents a budget category, which holds details about the category name, the total allocated amount, and the spending limit for that category.
    ExceedingBudget
    A concrete implementation of the INotification interface.
    IncomeManagement
    Manages the list of income sources and the calculation of total income.
    IncomeSource
    Represents an income source, such as a salary or business income.
    INotification
    Represents a notification service that can send notifications related to the budget.
    IValidation
    Represents a validation service that checks whether a user object is valid.
    LastMonthSpending
    A concrete implementation of the INotification interface.
    LogIn
    This class is responsible for validating a user's login credentials by checking the entered username and password against the existing users stored in the system's user database (in a JSON file).
    Main
    This class is the entry point for the budgeting application.
    SignUp
    This class is responsible for validating a user's sign-up process by checking if the username or email already exists in the system's user database (stored in a JSON file).
    Transaction
    This class represents a financial transaction with details about the transaction's name, category, and amount.
    TransactionsManagent
    This class is responsible for managing a collection of Transaction objects.
    User
    Represents a user in the system with their personal information, authentication details, and budget management.
    UsersManagment
    This class is responsible for managing a collection of User objects.
